Header.title: Vivekanand Education Society's Institute of Technology

About.paragraph: Vivekanand Education Society was founded in 1959 by Shri. Hashu Advani, along with ten other members, who shared the dream of providing qualitative education to the youth of our country. In the beginning, Vivekanand Education Society had a very modest launch, with just 256 students and six classrooms, in the humble barracks of Chembur Camp. But today, it proudly boast of having 3, 75, 000 sq. ft. land, housing 12 buildings and 28 Institutions, ranging from a cr√®che to Ph.D. Centers. It has over 2000 teaching and non-teaching staff, and more than 18,000 students who pass through its hallowed portals each year.

Contact.address: Hashu Advani Memorial Complex, Collector's Colony Chembur, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400074

Features.title: Amphitheater
Features.text: Our state-of-the-art amphitheater serves as a vibrant venue for cultural events, lectures, and performances, fostering creativity and community engagement among students.

Features.title: Auditorium
Features.text: Equipped with advanced audio-visual technology, our auditorium hosts seminars, workshops, and guest lectures, providing an immersive learning experience for all attendees.

Features.title: Sports
Features.text: We promote a healthy lifestyle through various sports facilities and programs, encouraging students to engage in physical activities, teamwork, and competition.

Features.title: Laboratory
Features.text: Our well-equipped laboratories provide hands-on experience in various disciplines, enabling students to apply theoretical knowledge and conduct experiments safely and effectively.

Features.title: Library
Features.text: Our extensive library offers a vast collection of books, journals, and digital resources, creating a conducive environment for research and self-study.

Features.title: Hostel
Features.text: Our comfortable and secure hostel facilities provide a home-like environment for students, fostering camaraderie and a supportive community away from home.

Features.title: Canteen
Features.text: The canteen offers a variety of healthy and delicious meal options, catering to diverse tastes and dietary requirements, creating a vibrant social hub for students.

Features.title: Language Lab
Features.text: Our language lab is designed to enhance students' communication skills through interactive learning and advanced language tools, preparing them for global opportunities.
